// src/api/api.js
import axios from"axios";import{logoutHandler}from"../utils/logoutHandler";const api=axios.create({baseURL:"http://localhost:8000",withCredentials:true});api.interceptors.response.use(response=>response,error=>{if(error.response&&error.response.status===401){console.warn("Session expired, logging out...");}return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
